original_text: The Israelites are to set up their tents by divisions, each of them in their own camp under their standard.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 막사를 치되 그 진영별로 각각 그 진영과 군기 곁에 칠 것이나

sentences.original_text: The Israelites are to set up their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 그들의 천막을 치어야 한다

sentences.original_text: each of them in their own camp
